usa: The Twenty-fourth Amendment to the United States Constitution, prohibiting both Congress and the states from conditioning the right to vote in federal elections on payment of a poll tax or other types of tax, was ratified.<sup id="cite_ref-363" class="reference">[363]</sup>
British Invasion: The Beatles arrived in the United States.[364]

The 1964, Alaska earthquake occurred at 5:36 PM AST and lasted four minutes and thirty-eight seconds to a magnitude 9.2 megathrust. It was the most powerful recorded in North American history, and the second most powerful recorded in world history.<sup id="cite_ref-usgs_365-0" class="reference">[365]</sup>

President Johnson proposed the Great Society, a set of social reforms aimed at the elimination of poverty and racial injustice.<sup id="cite_ref-366" class="reference">[366]</sup><sup id="cite_ref-367" class="reference">[367]</sup>
The Freedom Summer began, aimed to increase voter registration for African Americans.[368]
The Civil Rights Act of 1964, outlawing both segregation and major forms of discrimination against blacks and women, was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-369" class="reference">[369]</sup>
Tonkin Gulf incident, a false flag operation with 'deliberately skewed' intelligence to expand U.S. military involvement in Vietnam, occurred.[370][371][372]
Murders of Chaney, Goodman, and Schwerner: The bodies of three missing civil rights activists, working to register voters as a part of Freedom Summer, were found near Philadelphia, Mississippi.[373]
The Gulf of Tonkin Resolution, not a formal declaration of war in Vietnam, was signed by President Johnson<sup id="cite_ref-374" class="reference">[374]</sup>
The Economic Opportunity Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-375" class="reference">[375]</sup>
United States presidential election, 1964: President Lyndon B. Johnson defeated Arizona Senator Barry Goldwater.[376]
Dr. King became the youngest person ever to be awarded the Nobel Peace Prize, for his 'nonviolent campaign against racism'.<sup id="cite_ref-377" class="reference">[377]</sup>
